text: are you getting the most out of your
data your business generates
massive volumes of data from data center
environments such as
vmware and nas sas apps like microsoft
salesforce g suite and aws workloads
the challenge is protecting this data
without compromising business agility
and
employee productivity wherever your data
lives druva
powered by aws can protect it in the
cloud without the need for dedicated
on-site hardware and software
druva sas platform delivers the scale
security and simplicity of the cloud
with automated resource provisioning
eliminating the need for it oversight or
management
accelerate time to value with 15 minute
deployments
achieve simplicity with a single console
to define and monitor backups
with one-click disaster recovery to
recover in minutes
realize tco savings of up to 50 percent
with a consumption-based model
so you only pay for the amount of
storage consumed
further reduce storage costs with
automatic long-term data retention
to amazon s3 glacier deep archive your
data is always safe from internal and
external threats
with data encrypted in flight and at
rest with an aes 256 encryption key
that is controlled only by you are you
ready to future proof your data
protection
